## Slides.(constructor)

Constructs a new slide show

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
constructor(entity: Entity, slideUrls?: string[] | null);
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  entity | Entity | The entity the slides will be shown on |
|  slideUrls | string\[\] \| null | <i>(Optional)</i> The urls of the slides. These are the urls of the images that will be shown on the slides. They can be in the scene or in the internet. |
